creator: vandenbrande
title: VelleMan K5600R - ADVERTISEMENT LED DISPLAY DIY kit.
description: This project involves building a Velleman K5600R Advertisement LED Display DIY kit. The author intends to later add an Arduino, Bluetooth Module HC-06, and a mobile app to control the effects and power of the display.
steps: Obtain the Velleman K5600R DIY Kit.
Gather necessary tools: soldering iron and soldering tin.
Solder the components according to the provided instructions (illustrated_assembly_manual_k5600.pdf).
The project focuses solely on building the display itself; programming is not required for this part.
